item.title: 穆迪下调非洲进出口银行对赞比亚和加纳债务解决方案的评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将非洲进出口银行的债务评估下调至垃圾级，一个月前惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）也将其下调至垃圾级，理由是其资产表现弱于预期。【原文：Moody’s Ratings cut its assessment of African Export-Import Bank’s debt closer to junk status, a month after Fitch Ratings did the same, citing a weaker-than-expected asset performance.】

item.title: 南非通胀预期降至近四年低点
item.description: 南非的通胀预期降至近四年来的最低点，为政策制定者提供了继续推进宽松周期的另一个理由。【原文：South African inflation expectations fell to an almost four-year low, providing policymakers with another reason to press ahead with their easing cycle.】

item.title: 森特诺称欧洲央行不急于进一步降低利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）表示，在一年内八次削减借贷成本后，欧洲中央银行并不急于进一步降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank isn’t in a hurry to reduce borrowing costs further following eight cuts in the space of a year, according to Governing Council member Mario Centeno.】

item.title: 百度全面革新搜索引擎，增加人工智能功能和语音功能
item.description: 百度公司正在对中国最受欢迎的搜索引擎进行全面改造，增加人工智能功能和语音功能，这是该公司多年来最彻底的一次改革。【原文：Baidu Inc. is overhauling China’s most popular search engine with AI features and a voice function in its most sweeping revamp for years.】

item.title: 分析师称，TSB 出售令 BBVA 收购萨瓦德尔更加困难
item.description: 分析师称，萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）出售其英国分行将使 BBVA SA 对其西班牙小竞争对手的主动收购进一步复杂化。【原文：Banco Sabadell SA’s sale of its UK unit will further complicate the unsolicited takeover approach by BBVA SA for its smaller Spanish rival, analysts said.】

item.title: 印尼国家石油公司寻求 7 亿美元贷款以建造船舶
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼国有石油巨头印尼国家石油公司（PT Pertamina）及其航运部门正在寻求约 7 亿美元的海外贷款，用于建造船只。【原文：Indonesia’s state-owned oil giant PT Pertamina and its shipping arm are seeking an offshore loan of about $700 million for the construction of vessels, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本创纪录的税收收入让人质疑石破茂的承诺
item.description: 在截至 3 月的财政年度中，日本的税收收入达到了创纪录的约 75.2 万亿日元（5,240 亿美元），比政府的预测高出 1.8 万亿日元。但是，这笔意外之财仍然让人怀疑首相石破茂将如何为他的现金发放提供资金，而这是他在竞选时的一项重要承诺。【原文：Japan’s tax revenues hit a record of around ¥75.2 trillion ($524 billion) in the fiscal year ended March, surpassing government forecasts by ¥1.8 trillion. But the windfall still left questions over how Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba will fund his cash handouts, a key election pledge.】

item.title: M&A 拉动萨瓦德尔银行和 Spectris，欧洲股市上涨
item.description: 欧洲股市因交易消息上扬，Banco de Sabadell SA 同意出售其英国分部，Spectris Plc 收到 KKR & Co Inc.【原文：European stocks advanced on deals news, as Banco de Sabadell SA agreed to sell its British unit and Spectris Plc received an offer from KKR & Co Inc.】

item.title: 亚马逊为推动亚洲卫星互联网发展招聘高管
item.description: 亚马逊公司正在日本、韩国和台湾招聘政府销售主管，为其在东亚的卫星互联网业务奠定基础。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is looking to hire government sales leads in Japan, South Korea and Taiwan, laying the groundwork for its satellite internet business in East Asia.】

item.title: KKR 同意以 41 亿英镑收购思百吉，挑战降临公司
item.description: KKR & Co.已同意收购思百吉公司（Spectris Plc），该交易对这家英国精密测试设备和软件制造商的估值约为 41 亿英镑（约合 56 亿美元），超过了以 Advent 为首的财团此前的出价。【原文：KKR & Co. has agreed to buy Spectris Plc in a deal that values the UK maker of precision and testing equipment and software at about £4.1 billion ($5.6 billion), surpassing an earlier bid by a consortium led by Advent.】

item.title: 非行称国家贿赂和贪污阻碍肯尼亚经济发展
item.description: 非洲开发银行（African Development Bank）表示，肯尼亚需要解决贪污腐败问题，因为它耗尽了国家财政，破坏了经济增长。【原文：Kenya needs to tackle graft that’s draining the nation’s finances and undermining economic growth, according to the African Development Bank.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将连续第二天上涨，英镑维持在 1.37 美元上方
中国液化天然气造船企业不畏增长放缓，交付量创历史新高
item.description: 中国建造液化天然气油轮的造船厂不畏中国经济放缓的影响，在强劲需求的推动下，今年的交付量将创下历史新高。【原文：Chinese shipyards building liquefied natural gas tankers are defying the nation’s economic slowdown as strong demand sees them set to deliver a record number this year.】

item.title: 112 亿美元贷款交易创纪录后，新世界股价大涨
item.description: 在新世界发展有限公司完成创纪录的 112 亿美元贷款再融资方案后，该公司股价飙升至今年最高水平，帮助缓解了投资者的焦虑情绪。【原文：New World Development Co. shares surged to the highest level this year after the company closed a record $11.2 billion loan refinancing package, helping ease investor anxiety.】

item.title: 特朗普 35% 的关税威胁加剧了日本对最坏情况的担忧
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在连续第三天加剧紧张局势之际威胁对日本征收高达 35% 的关税，这加剧了市场参与者对最坏情况的担忧，并使人们对东京在贸易谈判中的策略产生怀疑。【原文：US President Donald Trump threatened Japan with tariffs of up to 35% as he ramped up tensions for a third straight day, fueling fears of a worst-case scenario among market players and raising doubts over Tokyo’s tactics in trade talks.】

item.title: KKR 将从 Aware Super 收购澳大利亚农业公司 ProTen
item.description: KKR & Co. 同意从 Aware Super 手中收购澳大利亚农业基础设施公司 ProTen Pty，这是美国私募股权公司在亚太地区的又一笔交易。【原文：KKR & Co. agreed to acquire Australian agriculture infrastructure company ProTen Pty from Aware Super, in another Asia-Pacific deal by the US private equity firm.】

item.title: 中国投资者抛售腾讯和小米股票，反弹势头减弱
item.description: 上个月，中国投资者抛弃了香港一些最大的科技股，考验着这些股票今年以来击败市场涨势的韧性。【原文：Chinese investors ditched some of the biggest tech stocks in Hong Kong last month, testing the resilience of their market-beating rally this year.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴提供 70 亿美元补贴捍卫中国市场
item.description: 随着竞争的白热化，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司将为食品配送和在线零售提供 500 亿元人民币（70 亿美元）的补贴，以促进其在中国的即时商务业务。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd is offering 50 billion yuan ($7 billion) of subsidies for food deliveries and online retail to boost its instant commerce business in China as competition heats up.】

item.title: 后见之明资本公司上半年特别报告
item.description:
政治驱动市场，但你需要后视镜来观察前方。【原文：

Politics drove markets, but you needed a rearview mirror to see what was ahead.

】

item.title: 股票热销令香港首日股价创 2022 年以来新高
item.description: 由于亚洲金融中心股市的反弹带动了股票销售热潮，香港的股票上市量在上个月创下了自 2022 年 12 月以来的新高。【原文：Listings in Hong Kong hit the highest since December 2022 last month, as a rally in the Asian financial hub’s stocks drove a rush for share sales.】

item.title: 洪灾造成多人死亡，中国准备应对更多暴雨
item.description: 中国正在为更强的降雨做准备，最近的极端天气事件已造成数人死亡，并淹没了中国的一些城市。【原文：China is bracing for more intense rainfall, in the latest extreme weather event that has left several dead and flooded some cities in the country.】

item.title: 韩国股市风起云涌
item.description:
由于新总统有可能推行期待已久的改革，投资者蜂拥而至。【原文：

Investors have flocked in as the new president looks likely to take up long-awaited reforms.

】

item.title: 曼哈顿房屋销售量激增 17%，现金买家居首位
item.description: 曼哈顿第二季度的房屋销售比近两年来更为强劲，这主要是受到现金买家的推动，他们并未因唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战所带来的经济不确定性而退缩。【原文：Manhattan home sales in the second quarter were stronger than they’ve been in almost two years, boosted by cash buyers undeterred by the economic uncertainty created by President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 机密报告警告：欧盟边境软件易受黑客攻击
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）和调查新闻编辑室《灯塔报告》（Lighthouse Reports）获得的电子邮件和机密审计报告，欧盟边防部队用于实时标记非法移民和犯罪嫌疑人的信息共享系统存在大量软件和安全漏洞。【原文：An information-sharing system used by EU border forces to flag illegal immigrants and suspected criminals in real time was rife with software and security vulnerabilities, according to emails and confidential audit reports obtained by Bloomberg News and investigative newsroom Lighthouse Reports.】

item.title: 泰国动荡威胁全球最差股市早盘涨幅
item.description: 总理钦那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）的停职缓解了泰国近期的政治风险，但投资者仍对该国的前景和市场前景保持警惕。【原文：Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra’s suspension from office has eased near-term political risks for Thailand, but investors remain wary about the country’s prospects and market outlook.】

item.title: 波兰出售 12 亿欧元绿色债券后将评估其潜力
item.description: 波兰债务主管表示，波兰在六年多来首次出售绿色债券后，应继续将其作为一种长期融资手段。【原文：Poland should continue to look at green bonds as a means of financing over the longer term after selling its first such securities in more than six years, according to the country’s debt chief.】

item.title: 波兰因预算风险暂缓加息
item.description: 在政策制定者以宽松的财政政策和全球价格风险为由转为谨慎之后，波兰可能会维持利率不变。【原文：Poland will likely keep interest rates unchanged after policymakers turned cautious, citing loose fiscal policy and global price risks.】

item.title: 尽管受到制裁，中国主要港口仍保持伊朗石油畅通
item.description: 今年，中国一些最大的港口接收了伊朗原油，支持了数十亿美元的石油贸易，凸显了美国在遏制德黑兰军方资金和维护现有制裁措施方面的巨大差距。【原文：Some of China’s largest ports have received Iranian crude this year, supporting a multi-billion oil trade and highlighting a significant gap in US efforts to curb funds for Tehran’s military and to uphold existing sanctions.】
